Name: 't Houtskooltje
Review Text: My review might be biased by the lovely weather that day. But I would say it counts for 1 extra star. First of this place is a hidden gem. The service was warm and kind. Had some great conversations about culture and such. I got the feeling ‚Ä¶

Name: 't Houtskooltje
Review Text: Nice place to taste the Turkey's food. Amsterdam's price.

Name: 't Houtskooltje
Review Text: Very calm and relaxing environment, there's a beautiful view of a pond just outside the place. The food is excellent, I haven't tried it all yet but I'm definitely going back to try all the different Bandi meals.

Name: 't Houtskooltje
Review Text: Very pleasant service and tasty food.

Name: 't Houtskooltje
Review Text: Our plan was to buy food and take it away. But the place was so beautiful that we decided to stay. The owner explained us everything in the menu. And even put some music un spanish for us. Super recomendable.

Name: 't Houtskooltje
Review Text: Simple Lebanese inspired food. Too small portions but also not expensive so I guess that‚Äôs ok. And tasty!

Name: 't Houtskooltje
Review Text: Expected a standard grillroom, was extremely surprised to find an excellent small Mediterranean restaurant. Kind staff, superb food, mezze were perfect.. All in all, highly recommended!

Name: 't Houtskooltje
Review Text: The place is quite cool, friendly staff but the grill mix was a big down,too much chicken and was raw, the ribs were ok, but I am not sure if I will come back.

Name: 't Houtskooltje
Review Text: This is a place to surprise you as it did to me, try meze all kinds. Ahmet (chef) is an ambitious guy who tries to show his best at his food.

Name: 't Houtskooltje
Review Text: The food was excellent the service outstanding.  The view is great.  Surrounded by water with ducks swimming around.

Name: 't Houtskooltje
Review Text: Very good food. Nice place. Hummus was just superb. Good price. Recommended

Name: 't Houtskooltje

Name: 't Houtskooltje
